actionCalls.description: Send an email to the user when a case is created.
actionCalls.name: SendEmail
actionCalls.label: Send Email

value.stringValue: Your service request to Request Loan Payoff Statement was created

actionCalls.description: Calls an action to send an email with an attachment.
actionCalls.name: SendEmailWithAttachment
actionCalls.label: Send email with attachment

assignments.description: Sets the values of the fields required to send an email.
assignments.name: AssignEmailPrerequisites
assignments.label: Assign Email Prerequisites

constants.description: Stores the address of the header image used in the email template.
constants.name: HeaderImageURL

decisions.description: Determines if the prerequisites to send an email are available or not.
decisions.name: HavePrerequisitesToSendAnEmail
decisions.label: Have Prerequisites To Send An Email?

decisions.description: Determines whether the email associated with the Account is available or not.
decisions.name: IsAccountEmailAvailable
decisions.label: Is Account Email Available?

decisions.description: Determines whether the attachment is created.
decisions.name: IsAttachmentCreated
decisions.label: Is Attachment Created?

decisions.description: Determines whether the statement needs to be sent through email.
decisions.name: IsViaEmailTrue
decisions.label: Is ViaEmail Set toTrue?

decisions.description: Determines which attribute is stored in the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop
decisions.name: SetWhichAttribute
decisions.label: Set Which Attribute?

Flow.description: Allows an agent to review the details of a customer's loan payoff statement request.

formulas.description: Creates the account name by concatenating first name and last name.
formulas.name: AccountNameFormula

formulas.description: Creates the row for email in the email template.
formulas.name: AddEmailRow
formulas.expression:
IF({!ViaEmail}<>'No' ,'
   •  Emailed to: '+''+ {!Email} +'',' ')

formulas.description: Creates the row for the shipping address in the email template.
formulas.name: AddShippingAddressRow
formulas.expression:
IF({!ViaPost}=='Yes' ,'
   •  Shipped to: '+''+{!FullAddressFormula}+' through '+''+{!ShippingPreference}+' shipping.' ,' ')

formulas.description: Creates the full address by concatenating the address fields.
formulas.name: FullAddressFormula

Flow.label: Review Loan Payoff Statement Request

loops.description: Iterates through Service Catalog Request Extended Attribute Values from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
loops.name: IterateThroughServiceCatalogRequests
loops.label: Iterate Through Service Catalog Requests

recordLookups.description: Gets the Attachment record with the ParentID values that matches the CaseId passed into the flow.
recordLookups.name: GetAttachment
recordLookups.label: Get Attachment

recordLookups.description: Gets the service catalog request extended attribute value records with a record Id matching the SvcCatalogRequestId that was passed into the flow. Stores the results in the Service Catalog Request Extended Attribute Value collection variable.
recordLookups.name: GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes
recordLookups.label: Get Service Catalog Request Extended Attributes

textTemplates.description: Stores the email content to be sent
textTemplates.name: AttachmentEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!AccountName},
Please find attached the loan payoff details for selected {!FinancialAccountNameFormula}.

Thank You,
Customer Support Team

textTemplates.description: Stores the body of the email thats sent when a case is created.
textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!AccountName},
Your service request to Request Loan Payoff Statement was created and your case number is {!CaseNumber}.

Request Summary:
Selected Account: {!FinancialAccountNameFormula}
Pay Off Date: {!PayoffDate}

The statement will be: {!AddEmailRow}{!AddShippingAddressRow}

Thank You,
Customer Support Team

variables.description: Stores the value of Account Email of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: AccountEmail

variables.description: Stores the value of Account Name of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: AccountName

variables.description: Stores the value of the AddressLine1 attribute of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: AddressLine1

variables.description: Stores the attribute name for Address Line 1

variables.description: Stores the attribute name for Address Line 2.
variables.name: AddressLine2Attribute

variables.description: Stores the ID of the case to update that is passed into the flow.
variables.name: CaseId

variables.description: Stores the ID of the service catalog request record passed into the flow.
variables.name: CaseNumber

waits.description: Determines when to pause the the flow interview and resume when conditions are met.
waits.name: Pause
waits.label: Pause
